shell: trimmomatic PE -phred33 ./data/rnaseq_1.fastq.gz ./data/rnaseq_2.fastq.gz ./output/014/trimmed_rnaseq_1.fastq.gz ./output/014/trimmed_rnaseq_1_unpaired.fastq.gz ./output/014/trimmed_rnaseq_2.fastq.gz ./output/014/trimmed_rnaseq_2_unpaired.fastq.gz ILLUMINACLIP:./data/minigenome.fa:2:30:10 LEADING:3 TRAILING:3 SLIDINGWINDOW:4:15 MINLEN:36
analyze: The quality control and adapter trimming task was completed successfully. Trimmomatic package was already installed and the paired-end reads were processed correctly, generating both trimmed and unpaired output files.
